A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is shocking in almost every single way. It takes bold risks\, makes crazy decisions\, and just when you think things couldn’t get any more epic\, The Last Jedi will surprise you again. Rian Johnson’s script is fantastic\, matched only by his direction. His movie is unique and unpredictable. Any time you think you know where the story is going\, he flips it on us. He’s given the characters a major upgrade by exploring parts of their stories in ways that were missing from The Force Awakens\, especially with Kylo Ren and Rey. However\, Leia’s role is also expanded and it ends up being a truly lovely tribute to the late Carrie Fisher. And Mark Hamill shines as Luke Skywalker. His performance in the movie is his best in the entire franchise. Overall\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi is a great movie. It is a truly incredible experience with moments that made me cheer and applaud\, and I will never forget these moments for days to come. Every character is worth caring about\, and I never felt uninterested. The moment the credits started rolling\, I immediately wanted to watch it again. I cannot wait to see what Rian Johnson has in store for audiences in the future of this beloved franchise.
